name: eslint-config-bandlab
description: BandLab's ESLint config, following our styleguide

scripts.preinstall: npm run install:config:base && npm run install:config:angularjs
scripts.install:config:base: cd packages/eslint-config-bandlab-base && npm prune && npm install
scripts.install:config:angularjs: cd packages/eslint-config-bandlab-angularjs && npm prune && npm install

author: Laurent Le Graverend (https://twitter.com/@yapfut)
